snippet: Lt. Jennara Cobb’s trial is the first stemming from a wiretap investigation that exposed widespread ticket-fixing by police union representatives.
abstract: Trial begins in case of Lt Jennara Cobb, New York City police officer charged with leaking information about a wiretap investigation into ticket-fixing; is first trial stemming from investigation that led to indictments against 16 New York City police officers and implicated some 600 others.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Jennara Cobb’s trial is the first stemming from a wiretap investigation that exposed widespread ticket-fixing by police union representatives.

headline.main: First Trial Begins in Police Ticket-Fixing Investigation
headline.print_headline: First Trial Begins in Police Ticket-Fixing Investigation

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
